PUZZLE_DESCRIPTION: The puzzle consists of marking arrival points from a starting point freely chosen by a user, among the 10 available, to arrive in a straight line at another point, passing through a point (marked or not). Evidently, each route starts from an unmarked starting point to arrive at an unmarked one that will be marked at the end of the route.
SCREENS_DESCRIPTION: On the left, the game's initial configuration, with all available nodes; in the middle, the game configuration when selecting node "A"; on the right, the configuration after having selected node "D" (starting from the middle configuration) and having selected node "A" again.
ABOUT_TEXT: Puzzle5star is an application built with Ionic Framework along with Angular. It is available in Portuguese and English, and its source code is available on GitHub. This application was developed for learning purposes only and is not for profit.
COLLABORATORS: Developed by William Niemiec. Special thanks to Renan Magagnin for developing the solver.
